nodes.text: Revenge of the Sith: The Expanded Visual Dictionary
Revenge of the Sith: The Expanded Visual Dictionary is a canceled visual dictionary reference book by DK Publishing.

This title was originally slated to be the fourteenth book in Dorling Kindersley's Visual Dictionary series and the sequel to the Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith: The Visual Dictionary. The book was slated for issue on September 30, 2013, but was canceled following the Disney–Lucasfilm decision to indefinitely postpone the book's release in order to concentrate on the Star Wars sequel trilogy. Despite this, however, it still retained an Amazon sale page, which also claimed it was to be released on June 1, 2016. However, the Amazon listing currently says that the product is unavailable.
